name: algoease
description: Decentralized escrow platform on Algorand for freelance payments

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd projects/algoease-frontend && npm install && cd ../../backend && npm install && cd ../projects/algoease-contracts && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.deploy:localnet: cd projects/algoease-contracts && algokit project deploy localnet
scripts.deploy:testnet: cd projects/algoease-contracts && algokit project deploy testnet
